name: Zoo keeper (itch) (Teamon, ggrusha art, shintaro_kk, Trozeman, Long-as-Python)
name_original: Zoo keeper (itch) (Teamon, ggrusha art, shintaro_kk, Trozeman, Long-as-Python)
description:
This game is about abondoned Zoo, and you are a new zookepeer.
You need to entertain, feed and take care of various animals.

This game contains 8 minigames with 7 difficulty levels. 

All minigames played with click(or taps).
